unnormalised: Arre bhai, my tailor is something else! He promised to stitch my sherwani in 3 days, but it's been 3 weeks! And when I finally got it, the sleeves were like 2 ft long! It looked like I was wearing someone else's clothes. Now he's saying it needs another 1 week for alterations. Seriously thinking of just buying one off the rack next time, even if itâ€™s a lil snug. At least I won't look like I'm trying to smuggle mangoes in my sleeves!
normalised: Oh brother, my tailor is something else! He promised to stitch my sherwani in three days, but it's been three weeks! And when I finally got it, the sleeves were like two feet long! It looked like I was wearing someone else's clothes. Now he's saying it needs another one week for alterations. Seriously thinking of just buying one off the rack next time, even if it's a little snug. At least I won't look like I'm trying to smuggle mangoes in my sleeves!
